alert.note: Alert for West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 2:05PM MST until December 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph, strongest tonight. * WHERE...Rabbit Ears Pass. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Roads will be snow covered, slick, and hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination.

area.areaDesc: West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet
